game.name: Expendable
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Somewhere in the future a hostile alien race conquers most of the galaxy. Scientists developed the “Millennium Soldier” project by cloning two super-soldiers. Armed with blasters they will battle scores of monsters, robots and boss aliens to save us and get a well-earned reward.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Somewhere in the future a hostile alien race conquers most of the galaxy. Scientists developed the “Millennium Soldier” project by cloning two super-soldiers. Armed with blasters they will battle scores of monsters, robots and boss aliens to save us and get a well-earned reward.

reviewHighlights.text: Expendable, developed by Rage Software and now available on Steam through Funbox Media Ltd, is a loud, unapologetically arcade-style shooter that feel...
